io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.element

Interface ModbusElement<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModbusCoilElement, ModbusRegisterElement<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDoubleWordElement, AbstractModbusElement, AbstractModbusRegisterElement, AbstractQuadrupleWordElement, AbstractWordElement, CoilElement, DummyCoilElement, DummyRegisterElement, FloatDoublewordElement, SignedDoublewordElement, SignedWordElement, UnsignedDoublewordElement, UnsignedQuadruplewordElement, UnsignedWordElement

    public interface ModbusElement<T>
    A ModbusElement represents one or more registers or coils in a ReadTask.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets a value that should be written to the Modbus device

      Number of registers or coils

      OpenemsType getType()
      Gets the type of this Register, e.g.
      void invalidate()
      resets the value in case if value could not be read from the modbus device
      boolean isIgnored()
      Whether this Element should be ignored (= DummyElement)
      void setModbusTask(AbstractTask abstractTask)
      Set the AbstractTask, where this Element belongs to.
